title: Sheriff's detectives seek gunman who ran over victim in brazen West Hollywood robbery
dc:creator: Robert J. Lopez
description: Surveillance video captured the attack, in which a gunman appears to rob a man in a parking lot and then run over him with a car. The victim survived.
content:encoded: Surveillance video captured the attack, in which a gunman appears to rob a man in a parking lot and then run over him with a car. The victim survived.
